name: Powers of Two
description: A new world begins within the shell. For every new layer, its size and depth are increased; for every new surface, a new layer is placed on top of the already existing. New objects appear and disappear as the world grows. The new world is surrounded by the old world. At the same time, each layer, including the exterior surface of the shell, is completely destroyed. Each new world is divided into six regions that are populated by different kinds of living things.  1440x1440 60fps mp4
